blindsight.name: blindsight
blindsight.title: BlindSight
blindsight.description: < iOS, Twilio API, Firebase API, CoreML >
blindsight.information: An iOS app focused on assistive technology that helps the visually impaired through object recognition and live video remote assistance and maps integration.

grow.name: grow
grow.title: Grow
grow.information: An iOS app that allows users to find eco-friendliness of companies using CoreML and ARKit. It also allows users to work towards personal sustainability goals.

easygr.name: easygr
easygr.title: EasyGr
easygr.information: Website assisting students in calculating their GPA as well as grades required to meet a required GPA.

healthline.name: healthline
healthline.title: HealthLine
healthline.description: < iOS, Twilio API, Python, Google Maps API >
healthline.information: An iOS app that provides medical diagnosis, rash recognition as well as finding nearby hospitals without internet.

kinemagic.name: kinemagic
kinemagic.title: KineMagic
kinemagic.information: An android app that solves various kinematic equations with the option of graphing the solution.

paypool.name: paypool
paypool.title: PayPool
paypool.description: < iOS, Interac API, Firebase API, Alamofire API >
paypool.information: An iOS app utilising firebase backend and an Interac e-transfer API focused prototype for splitting bills.
